ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon unsalted butter, or as needed

cookingTips: Separate eggs carefully with no yolk in whites, and add vinegar to help whites whip to peaks
Whip egg whites until stiff peaks form for light, airy clouds
Cook on very low heat to prevent browning while setting the whites
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on properly whipping egg whites to achieve the cloud-like texture and gentle cooking technique.
